alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hamblen; Hawkins; Jefferson; Sullivan; Unicoi; Washington (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 15 at 4:56AM CDT until August 16 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of east Tennessee, including the following counties, Carter, Cocke, Greene, Hamblen, Hawkins, Jefferson, Sullivan, Unicoi and Washington. * WHEN...Until 815 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 555 AM EDT, local law enforcement reported heavy rain in the advisory area due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is already occurring. Between 1.5 and 2.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Several roads remain closed across Greene County, TN - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Johnson City, Morristown, Greeneville, Elizabethton, Jefferson City, Erwin, Dandridge, Jonesborough, Tusculum, White Pine, Baneberry, Parrottsville, Russellville, Midway, Gray, Banner Hill, Oak Grove, Pine Crest, Central and Hampton. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.

area.areaDesc: Greene; Hamblen; Hawkins; Jefferson; Sullivan; Unicoi; Washington
